episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_01: I wanna take a photo with the living legend!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_02: What’s up with you all of a sudden?
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_03: And what is a living legend?
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_04: Ah, sorry. Let me explain in detail...
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_05: The living legend is the legendary Trainer Red.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_06:
Red’s always appearing and vanishing on Pasio.
We don’t usually know where he is.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_07:
Even when we think we’ve found him,
he suddenly disappears.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_08:
So if we took a photo with an extremely rare and
terrifically strong Trainer, don’t you think my fans
would love it?
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_09: Ah, I see. If that’s the case, I can help you.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_10: My fans would like that, too.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_12:
But he’s a strong opponent, so it won’t be an
easy task.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4001_1001_13: Let’s round up some more people to help out!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4002_1001_01:
So that’s where we’re at,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Please help us!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4002_0302_04: Are you sure I can help?
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4002_0402_05: We’re asking you because Red also respects you.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4002_1001_06: A photo with Red... That sounds like fun!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4002_1001_09:
All we need now is to figure out a way to find
him. Even though we have a lot of people helping,
there’s only so much we can do.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4002_0401_11: Do you have something in mind?
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4003_1001_01:
It’s true that Red’s been spotted wherever intense
battles happen to be.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4003_1001_02:
If we have a battle he’d want to join, we could
get Red to come to us!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4003_1001_04:
In that case, I’ll prepare a location. I’ll find the
perfect place!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4003_1001_06: All that’s left to do is...
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4004_1001_01: You’re planning on luring Red out?
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4004_1001_02:
I don’t care about some photo, but if I can battle
Red, I don’t mind helping you guys.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4004_1001_03: Me too... I would love to battle Red.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4004_1001_05: Sure! We’ll make it a heated battle!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4004_1001_06: OK, we now have all the pieces we need.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4005_1001_01:
These team battles are getting exciting. The next
matchup is...
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4006_1001_01: Wow, you really are a living legend!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4006_1001_02:
You lived up to your name and showed us how
strong you are!
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4006_1001_06:
Could you take a photo with us?
Y’know, to commemorate the moment.
episode_event_whiteday_2023/4006_1001_13: Come on, we’re taking the photo!
